name: Gravity Life
description:
Gravity on earth has become unstable. Periodically, you find yourself in zero gravity and you can't do anything about it. Enemies attack you and destroy your buildings. Can you wait for help?

============================================================

The game is made for Weekly Game Jam 211 and is not completely finished yet. I will be glad to listen to your criticism and advice.

[Space] - fire

[A/D/Arows] - movement

[E] - build/upgrate buildings
